title: Connect 1.1 – Phone calls using Bluetooth connection
content: Connect lets you connect with your friends by allowing you to place phone calls and receive phone calls from your Mac using a Bluetooth connection to your phone. You may also press the keys 0-9 * # during a call, to use the dialer.   WHAT’S NEW Version 1.1: Fixed a minimum version compatibility issue. […]

title: Taskdeck 1.0.8 – Versatile task management in the menu bar
